casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America ex rel. Giuseppe ESPOSITO, Next Friend of Giovanni Esposito, Relator-Appellant, v. Edward CORSI, Commissioner of Immigration, RespondentAppellee. No. 355. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 20, 1933. Frank R. Galgano, of New York City (James C. Thomas, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. George Z. Medalie, U. S. Atty., of New York City (William Jay Hoff, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
